transcript.text: well more than 20 years ago some some of
my interns came to me and they said jump
all we we noticed that Dennett one of
the bookstore's here and in the area
which is at that time Fort Worth Texas
that they're doing son they're doing
psychic readings horoscope readings and
tarot card readings and what what do you
say if we go there and we do dream
interpretations and spiritual readings
and I said great idea let's let's do it
so we went to the bookstore my interns
did they went to the bookstore and they
met with the manager the bookstore the
manager said okay I had a dream eight
years ago no one has been able to
interpret and if you can interpret it
I'll give you a shot so she sat down at
her desk and and told the dream and they
got the interpretation total the
interpretation in during the
interpretation she slides out of her
chair onto the floor crying behind her
desk she gets up and says okay I'll give
you a shot
but she gives us the worst possible time
like seven to nine o'clock on a Saturday
night the the in the middle of the month
when everybody's already spent their
money because she didn't know how well
we would go over we went there
interpreted dreams prophesied that's all
spiritual readings is it's really
prophecy and by the end of the night we
had to carry people to their cars
because they still hadn't composed
themselves enough to walk out on their
own they had people coming back to the
store saying when are they coming back
when are they coming back we will pay
for them to come back whatever the cost
is we'll pay for it the impact was so so
great now 20 plus years later that is
happening all over the United States and
all over the world actually back in
nineteen in the 1990s it was happening
nowhere we received an incredible amount
of criticism because of it how dare you
take the gospel to those who are in the

where were you before you got saved you
may not have been in the new age of the

this is the largest unreached people
group in America what do you mean don't
go near them so the Lord began to take
us into those incredible environments
and he began to talk talk with us and
teach us and we begin to talk with them
and teach them we go into incredible
places like Burning Man but last number
of years have been a Burning Man that's
where a week-long festival in the high
desert of Nevada 52,000 tents will be
set up in a semicircle around a 30-foot
tall wooden structure that will burn at
the end of the week they'll set it on
fire this man this wooden man they build
they'll set on fire and they'll throw
all their carries cares into the fire
believing that that will burn up their
past and start a whole new life for them
they did the same thing every year we
started to go in there over eight years
ago we were you're put into the
semicircle in the order of your
popularity or newness so if you're on
the back row of this semicircle then
you're a brand new tent and if you're on
the front row then you're among the most
popular tents we are on the head for the
last three years have been on the front
row among the top five out of 52,000 not
because we compromised the word but
because we show them something they've
never seen before we have lines of
people that will line up outside of the

minutes to two hours just to get into
the tent to pick from a menu board that
we have called spirit cafe menu
so we have dream interpretation pretty
obvious we have spiritual readings which
just prophesy spiritual cleansing which
is deliverance and and so on and

terminology that will pique their
interest we have people come to Jesus
every year there and we have people come

have teachers doctors attorneys judges
not only from the United States from

come there we do the same thing in Salem
